title: Zemaraim
content:
ZEMARAIM

1. Town near the northern border of the territory of Benjamin (Jos 18:22). The most likely location is Ras ez-Zeimara, about five miles (8 kilometers) northeast of Bethel in the hill country between et-Taiyibeh and Rammum.

2. Mountain in the hill country of Ephraim (2 Chr 13:4) and the scene of Abijahâ€™s speech of rebuke against Jeroboam and the Israelites.
